channel.title: empart technologies on Cork OpenCoffee

item.title: Cork Open Coffee Friday May 29th
item.description: This weeks Cork Open Coffee, Friday May 29th is in the Rubicon building next to CIT from 10am-12pm. Here is a basic map to the Rubicon Center. http://www.comhar.com/Direct_Rubicon_Centre.html The demo/talk slot is from Joe Walsh from Empart Technologies. Impart technologies provide situational based assessment using standard Internet based tools. Joes business has recently been accepted on to the Genesis Enterprise programme in the Rubicon and would like to share the businesses plans so far with Cork Open Coffee and hear your views.
